Class GraphPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GraphPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Component used to manage Graph actions and visual graph manipulations.
    Author:
    Jason Cockrell, Ty Devries, Alex McCabe, Michael Owoc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
